title: Jeffrey Breslow On Winning and Losing in Investing, Business and Life
description: Toy-industry executive and Hall of Fame game inventor of such favorites as Operation, Simon, and Ants in the Pants, Jeffrey Breslow, talks to MarketWatch assistant managing editor Rachel Koning Beals about why games reflect investing and life, overnight leadership after an office tragedy, how an inventor reinvents life post-career and much more.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
